blocks.title: Environment Friendly
blocks.content: Find hotels that are committed to the well-being of our planet. Our partner hotels are committed to sustainable environmental practices like no single-use plastic, renewable energy sources, recycling and use of recycled materials and use sustainably sourced food.

blocks.title: Community Championship
blocks.content: We are committed to support hotels and tour operators that are fully or partially locally owned, hire and educate local communites, support local artisans and businesses. Some of our partners are also actively engaged in supporting local communities through NGOs and foundations.

blocks.title: Regenerative Tourism
blocks.content: On Sustivo, you will find businesses that are actively involved in the regeneration of our planet through ocean cleanups, conservation of forests and marine ecosystems, and, protection of wild animals.
